Outcome.DescriptionText: Before reaching the unknown power source, your troops were attacked by unknown enemies and had to fall back. From far away they saw something taking off from the pick of the mountain.

Your forces found buried under the snow a wreckage of what is clearly a very old ship. Its reactor was damaged and yet still barely working, that was the source that caused errors in our scans. Order was given to destroy it and proceed with planet scans. Updated scans shown that those mountain chains are way more massive than previously detected

Your forces that were sent to the surface to examine whats the source of interference of scans quickly realised its a massive dormant volcano. Strong magnetic field generated by magma movement was the source.
Your troops following the trail of the power source signature were lead to a ancient relic. Without any delay they retrieve it.
Your troops following the trail of the power source signature were lead to hidden ancient hangar. Inside of it they found several ships in perfect condition that are space worthy .
Your troops following the trail of the power source signature were lead to hidden pirate hangar. Inside of it they found frigate class ship in perfect condition.

Your forces found buried under the snow split in half a very old ship. Its damaged reactor was leaking ionized liquid, that was the source that caused errors in our scans. While searching the wreck our troops stumbled upon a weapon schematics. Nothing else was worth taking so an order was given to destroy it the remains.
